official_title: To prohibit the operation of a nuclear power plant for which the Federal Emergency Management Agency has determined the offsite emergency preparedness are inadequate.

summary.text: Emergency Preparedness Improvement Act of 1991 - Prohibits the operation of a nuclear powerplant for which the Federal Emergency Management Agency has determined that offsite emergency preparedness plans are inadequate.
